comment: This games shows the difficulties caused by Black's premature ... Ne4, which has produced some sort of deformed Stonewall. When the Black Knight is exchanged at e4, Black does best to recapture with the f-pawn, and this of course, requires that Black should have played ... Pf5 before inviting the Exchange
reasoning: The comment provides a detailed explanation of the strategic flaw in Black's move, highlighting the importance of prior planning and the resulting complications.
